column1: I would be prepared to pay a premium for products I consider to be ethically manufactured or sourced
I don’t shop at retailers that have a poor record on issues relating to the environment, ethics and or/sustainability
There’s no point in changing what I buy or where I buy from, it won’t make any real difference to the environment
If I really want a product the fact it’s not produced or sourced in an ethical or sustainable way would not stop me from buying
Labelling related to environmental/ethical credentials of a product can often be misleading
Social media sites have made me more aware of ethical and environmental issues while shopping
